results.description: Cardiff Devils sign Canadian-born defenceman Shaone Morrisonn, who has played more than 500 games in the NHL.
results.title: Cardiff Devils sign ex-NHL player Shaone Morrisonn

results.description: Ice hockey pundit Don Cherry accused immigrants of not wearing Remembrance Day poppies.
results.shortTitle: Canada sports pundit fired over 'you people' rant
results.title: Don Cherry: Canadian hockey pundit fired for poppy rant

results.description: Guildford Flames earned the win over Cardiff Devils after a flurry of late goals transformed a stalemate.
results.title: Elite League: Guildford Flames 3-1 Cardiff Devils

results.description: Nottingham Panthers beat Belfast Giants for the second night in a row with a 2-0 win at the Motorpoint Arena.
results.title: Nottingham Panthers double up against Belfast Giants

results.description: Belfast Giant's winning run of six games in a row was ended by a humbling 4-1 defeat by Nottingham Panthers at the Motorpoint Arena.
results.title: Elite League: Nottingham Panthers end Belfast Giants' winning run

results.description: A Gleason Fournier hat-trick helps the Cardiff Devils beat Elite League leaders Sheffield Steelers at the Viola Arena.
results.title: Elite League: Cardiff Devils 4-3 Sheffield Steelers

results.description: American defenceman Ryan Lowney, 25, joins the Belfast Giants from HKM Zvolen of Slovakia.
results.shortTitle: Giants sign Lowney from Slovakian club
results.title: Belfast Giants sign American defenceman Ryan Lowney from HKM Zvolen

results.description: Belfast Giants hit 10 goals in back-to-back weekend victories over Coventry Blaze to move to the top of the Elite League table.
results.title: Six-in-a-row Giants go top with Coventry double

thumbnail.altText: Belfast Giants players celebrate a goal

results.description: Kade Foster's friends may not have made it to his party, but he was the most popular boy on Twitter.
results.title: Celebrities wish lonely Canada boy happy birthday

thumbnail.altText: Kade Foster at his 11th birthday party

results.description: Finnish forward Matias Sointu leaves Cardiff Devils after a short-term deal.
results.shortTitle: Sointu leaves Devils after loan spell
results.title: Cardiff Devils: Finnish forward Matias Sointu ends loan spell

results.description: Belfast Giants hit Coventry Blaze for six to secure a sixth Elite League win on the bounce and move to the top of the standings.
results.shortTitle: Giants seal Elite League win over Blaze
results.title: Elite League: Free-scoring Belfast Giants go top with 6-3 win over Coventry Blaze

results.description: Cardiff Devils bounce back after Saturday's defeat at Fyfe Flyers with victory over bottom of the table Dundee Stars in the Elite League.
results.title: Elite League: Dundee Stars 2-4 Cardiff Devils

results.description: Fife Flyers move above Cardiff Devils in the Elite League table with an emphatic 5-1 victory.
results.title: Elite League: Fife Flyers 5-1 Cardiff Devils

results.description: Belfast Giants continue their winning run with a 4-1 Elite League victory over Coventry Blaze at the SSE Arena.
results.shortTitle: Giants beat Coventry to maintain run
results.title: Elite League: Belfast Giants make it five wins in a row with victory over Coventry

results.description: Cardiff Devils make a remarkable comeback against Coventry Blaze to book a place in the quarter-finals off the Challenge Cup.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff Devils 4-4 Coventry Blaze (Devils win shootout)
results.title: Challenge Cup: Cardiff Devils 4-4 Coventry Blaze (Devils win shootout)

results.description: Belfast Giants extend their winning Elite League run to four games as they secure a 4-1 away victory over Fife Flyers.
results.shortTitle: Giants earn fourth straight win in Fife
results.title: Elite League: Belfast Giants earn fourth straight win as they triumph 4-1 in Fife

results.description: Watch the highlights from Scotland's Elite Ice Hockey League clubs this weekend.
results.shortTitle: Puck Drop: Derbies & bust ups in busy weekend

results.description: Guildford Flames edge a shoot-out at Cardiff Devils in the Challenge Cup after overtime fails to separate the two sides.
results.title: Challenge Cup: Cardiff Devils 3-3 Guildford Flames OT
